DOC.brief_summary: - The aim study compare effect coadministration ezetimibe 10 mg/die + fenofibrate 200 mg/die versus pravastatin 40 mg/die monotherapy HIV-infected patient treat protease inhibitor . - Single-centre , open , randomize , control , prospective pilot study . - 60 patient enrolled order reach target 50 patient evaluable end study . The patient randomly assign 6-month treatment ezetimibe+fenofibrate pravastatin.The visit every month .
DOC.brief_title: Coadministration Ezetimibe With Fenofibrate Versus Pravastatin Monotherapy Treatment Hyperlipidaemia HIV-infected Patients
DOC.criteria: patient older 18 year document positive HIV antibody test stable therapy PIs least 12 month LDLcholesterol > 130 mg/dl triglyceride 200 500 mg/dl nonHDL cholesterol > 160 mg/dl unresponsive dietary measure regular physical exercise history dyslipidemia antiretroviral therapy cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease Cushing 's syndrome concurrent therapy lipidlowering agent , oral anticoagulant , estrogens , thiazidic diuretic , betablockers hypothyroidism Type 1 diabetes mellitus renal failure
